RelatedSentence: Police tell the Providence Journal that 22 - year - old Hector Aguayofuentes , of Providence , was shot in the leg early Saturday .
He tells police he was leaving the bar with a friend shortly after 1 a.m. Saturday when they both noticed he was bleeding .
